name: Kaji Buta
description1: Cindertooth: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT and remove enemy shield [0 pips]
description2: Backdrafter: Deal 100 damage and summon a minino if enemy has a DoT [1 pip]
description3: Smoke Spirit: Deal 200 damage and gain 2 pips if enemy is a minion [2 pips]
description4: Hot Hand: Deal a 225, 3 turn DoT [2 pips]
description5: Scorchbats: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and remove a shield from all enemies [4 pips]
description6: Cinderbird: Sacrifice minion to deal 250 damage to all enemies and detonate a DoT [5 pips]
description7: Pyredon: Deal 200 damage and place a 150, 3 turn DoT if you have a minion summoned [2 pips]
description8: Bennu Alight: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and remove all shields from enemy [3 pips]
description9: Garmr's Growl: Deal a 225, 3 turn DoT that detonates if you have a HoT [2 pips]
description10: Fiery Doom: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and a 150, 3 turn DoT if you have a minion summoned [4 pips]

name: Yuki Senshi
description1: Impenetrable Wall: Place a 75 shield, stun resist 2 turn bubble [0 pips]
description2: Hark, A Shark!: Clear mantle for a 75 shield to self then deal 50 damage [0 pips]
description3: Coldest Steel: Deal 75 damage and clear blade for a 75 shield to self [1 pip]
description4: Hypothermi-Hiya!: Deal 150 damage and place a 75 weakness if enemy has a trap [2 pips]
description5: The Long Night: Place a 200 shield, stun resist 2 turn bubble on whole team [4 pips]
description6: Tundra Titan: Clear mantle for 100 shield to self then deal 200 damage to all enemies [5 pips]
description7: Frigid Chill: Place a 50 weakness and gain 1 pip if you have a bubble [0 pips]
description8: Frozen Ocean: Deal 225 damage or 300 damage if you have a bubble [3 pips]
description9: Winter Wing: Deal 150 damage and place a 75 weakness if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description10: Snow Cannonade: Deal 150 damage to all enemies and place a 75 weakness if enemy has a trap [4 pips]

name: Hogg Wilde
description1: Wilde Tremble: Place a 50 weakness [0 pips]
description2: Wilde Serpent: Deal 50 damage and gain a 75 blade if enemy has a mantle [0 pips]
description3: Wilde Zeal: Place a 125 blade and remove a DoT [1 pip]
description4: Wings Of The Wilde: Deal 100 damage and clear enemy HoT to stun them [1 pip]
description5: Wilde Cat: Deal 200 damage and place a 75 weakness if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description6: Wilde Djinn: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a 75 weakness if enemy has a mantle [4 pips]
description7: Ursa Wilde: Deal 200 damage and gain 50 HP [3 pips]
description8: Wilde Maelstrom: Place a dispel, 75 weakness, or -75 heal mantle on enemy (choice is random) [1 pip]
description9: Wilde Hearts: Heal 50 HP and a 2 to 4 round HoT that heals 50 each turn (length of HoT is random) [2 pips]
description10: Wilde Squall: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and remove enemy HoT to stun them [5 pips]

name: Infamous Inoshishi
description3: Poisoned Dart: Deal 200 damage and place a 100 trap if you have a shield [2 pips]
description4: Rush Of Combat: Deal 200 damage and gain a double pip, 2 turn bubble if your team has a minion [3 pips]
description5: Fortune Reversal: Steal enemy shield and deal 150 damage [3 pips]
description6: Soul Scourge: Sacrifice minion and deal 250 damage. Place 100 trap if you have a shield [5 pips]
description7: Retaliation: Deal 100 damage or clear mantle and do 200 damage [2 pips]
description8: Surprise Attack: Push trap and detonate DoT [0 pips]
description9: Pip, Pip, Hooray: Target minion to remove traps from team and gift a pip [3 pips]
description10: Ninja Fury: Divide 400 damage between enemies [4 pips]

name: Ghost Pig
description1: Stench Bug: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT [0 pips]
description2: Red Death: Place a 100 trap [1 pip]
description3: Maiden Of Pain: Deal 200 damage and clear enemy HoT for a 100 trap [2 pips]
description4: Festering Wound: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and place a -75 heal trap [2 pips]
description6: Putrescent Wound: Deal a 250, 5 turn DoT to all enemies and place a -75 heal trap [5 pips]
description7: Atrophy: Place a 100 weakness and clear enemy HoT for a 75, 3 turn DoT [1 pip]
description8: Befouling Brew: Deal a 500, 5 turn DoT and place a dispel if you have a shield [4 pips]
description9: Siphon Strength: Place a 200 weakness and clear enemy blade for a double pip, 2 turn bubble [2 pips]
description10: Unhallowed Aid: Deal 250 damage and give team 100 blades if you have a blade [5 pips]

name: Daring Daisuke
description1: Clever Trap: Place a 50 weakness and a 75 trap [0 pips]
description2: Sneak Attack: Deal 100 damage and place a 75 trap if you have a trap on you [1 pip]
description3: Heroic Strike: Deal 200 damage and remove enemy bubble [2 pips]
description4: Battle Meditation: Place a triple pip, 2 turn bubble [3 pips]
description5: Cunning Trap: Place a 75 weakness and a 125 trap on all enemies [4 pips]
description6: Shadowy Ambush: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and place a 125 trap on them if you have a trap on you [5 pips]
description7: Pre-Emptive Strike: Deal 50 damage and place a 75 weakness if enemy has 4 or more pips [0 pips]
description8: Inspire Courage: Gift 2 pips and clear shield / trap for another pip [2 pips]
description9: Reckless Chance: Deal 50 damage and place a global double pips bubble [1 pip]
description10: Bombing Run: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a 75 weakness if enemy has 4 or more pips [4 pips]
